analysis.description:
Reentrancy in LambdaLock.claim (/unique_chucks/36/0xa555042f07bfd19e251cc21c84c35725a47d4c66.sol#244-268):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(LambdaToken.transfer(msg.sender,amount)) (/unique_chucks/36/0xa555042f07bfd19e251cc21c84c35725a47d4c66.sol#255-258)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- beneficiaryClaims (/unique_chucks/36/0xa555042f07bfd19e251cc21c84c35725a47d4c66.sol#259)

LambdaLock.claim (/unique_chucks/36/0xa555042f07bfd19e251cc21c84c35725a47d4c66.sol#244-268) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- cur_claim.delay.add(genesisTime) < block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/36/0xa555042f07bfd19e251cc21c84c35725a47d4c66.sol#249-267)
